title: 07/13/2021 - HOUR 1 - Shohei Ohtani, USA, Sixers
itunes:title: 07/13/2021 - HOUR 1 - Shohei Ohtani, USA, Sixers
description:
MLB needs to do a better job marketing Shohei Ohtani. He's better than Babe Ruth

Thoughts on Team USA losing back to back games

The Sixers are shopping Ben Simmons


Guest: Chris Broussard
